scripts.dev: VITE_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) VITE_APP_PORT=$(port) UI_PORT=8888 npm run x
scripts.x: hc s clean &&  npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run start:happ"
scripts.network:app: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently -k "npm run build:watch -w @holochain/how" "npm start -w app" "npm run launch" "holochain-playground"
scripts.network:applet: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently -k "npm run build:watch -w @holochain/how" "npm start -w applet" "npm run launch" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.launch: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/how.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network mdns
scripts.package:app: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @holochain/how && npm run package -w app
scripts.package:applet: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @holochain/how && npm run package -w applet
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
